review_data.title: Good food, but lacking in atmosphere.
review_data.content: Located on Bus line #31 (Micafil) or one block away with the Tram #2 (Farbhof). This restaurant opened in April 2013. They offer an all you can eat lunch buffet for CHF 17.50 in addition to a take out selection. Opens at 11.30 for lunch,...More
